channel.title: Soul Sanctuary Radio
channel.description: Soul Sanctuary Inc. presents a potent blend of soulful music and engaging talk through an assortment of regularly-scheduled radio programming. We've got something for everyone...jazz, funk, soul, hiphop and much more. Hosted by Stephanie Renée, Skip the Funktologist, and DJ DOC & Jodine. Give us a listen!
channel.copyright: Recordings are used within this podcast by permission of the artist and/or record label, thanks to our wonderful relationships with many industry execs and performers. These episodes are for sharing only...and if you like the music, we encourage you to purchase the entire unfiltered songs or albums from your favorite retail outlet or our official iTunes affiliate.
channel.itunes:author: Soul Sanctuary, Inc.
channel.itunes:summary: Produced by VibeMistress Stephanie Renee, Soul Sanctuary Inc. presents an eclectic blend of soulful sounds -- R&B, Latin, jazz, hiphop, funk, house and more. Hosted by Stef, along with Skip The Funktologist, DJ DOC & Jodine Dorcé. Welcome to the Congregation!
channel.itunes:subtitle: VibeMistress Stephanie Renee says: It's all about soulful expression!

item.title: Spasmodic Movements - May 21 show
item.description:
So sorry that we missed getting this posted before the Memorial Day weekend, but it still jams hard!
Play List
1. Pablo Fierro- Vida 2. Salvatore Agrosi Ft. Sphelele- Mahogany (Trinadadian Deep Mix) 3. Quinten Harris & Koffee- Paradise (Black Coffee Rmx) 4. Kings of Groove ft. Jessi Colasante- I Can't Get You (Original Mix) 5. Untitled 6. Usher- Climax (G'Sparks Spilulu Remix) 7. Sundee ft. Nomhle- Xhosa Tribe (Da Capo's Bapedi Ritual Mix) 8. Dj Roland Clark ft. Madame Simone- Imagination (RC Main Mix) 9. Phil Asher ft. Spry- Textya (Lost Heroes Revision Afr Tech Version) 10. The Dizz & Azza Mmelashon- I Want You For Myself (Vick Lavendar Sophisticado Vocal Version)

item.title: The Original SSR - wk of June 4
item.description:
THE ORIGINAL SOUL SANCTUARY RADIO - week of June 4 ** Hosted by Your VibeMistress Stephanie Renée **
Fiesta - Chuck Brown & Little Benny Stakes Is High - De La Soul Move The Crowd - Eric B & Rakim I Can't Help It - Esperanza Spalding You Just Don't Know - Phyllis Hyman She Was Fly - Full Crate & Mar ft Eric Roberson Deja Vous - Les Nubians ft Eric Roberson Cake & Eat It Too [Teeko Re-Funk] - Bilal Man I Use To Be - Oddisee Mattered Much - Oddisee ft Olivier Daysoul Average Fruit - Quadron Bella - Beady Belle Que Se Sepa - Roberto Roena Crazy [live at Darryl's House] - Cee Lo Green & Darryl Hall

item.title: GUEST MIX - A Strange Delight
item.description:
We've traveled across the Atlantic to bring you this soulful house mix from our good buddy Edonist.
Playlist
Mark Di Meo feat. Nickson 2013 Let It Be Love (You Should Be Mine) (N2019Dinga Gaba remix) - Quantize Dom Navarra feat. Arnold Jarvis 2013 All Around The World (Dom2019s alternate take) - French Kiss DJ Man-X & Vick Lavender feat. Shawnee Taylor 2013 Happy Endings (Reelsoul vocal remix) 2013 Deep Haven N2019Dinga Gaba & DJ Spen feat. Marc Evans 2013 Until You (N2019Dinga2019s deep in you dub) - Quantize Jonny Montana presents Empress Lebo 2013 Eternally Bound (Original Mix) taken from the 2018Ndinawe2019 EP 2013 Camio Bucie feat. Zakes Bantwini 2013 Do You ? 2013 Demor Music Culoe De Song feat. 340ml 2013 Let The Sunshine 2013 Soulistic Music Alpha & Olmega feat. Sheyi 2013 The African Drummer (Fabio Genito fiyapon editstrumental) 2013 Tribe DJ Ax feat. Charles Dockins 2013 My Father2019s Arms (Oscar P. & C. Scott NYC mix) - Maurice Joshua Digital Tamara Wellons 2013 Euphoria (DJ Spinna galactic soul mix) - Seasons Limited DJ Spen presents Dana Weaver 2013 Heavenly (DJ Spen & Gary Hudgins mix) 2013 Quantize AphroDisiax & Afronaut feat. Sabrina Chyld 2013 Slip Away (Club mix) - MN2S Claudja Barry 2013 Love For The Sake Of Love (Social Disco Club edit) - London Records

item.title: SSR on ProjectVibe - May 24 show
item.description:
SOUL SANCTUARY RADIO FOR PROJECTVIBE ** May 24 show - hosted by Your VibeMistress Stephanie Renée **
Look What You're Doin' To Me - Jazzanova ft Phonte So Jaded - Anthony David I Was Made To Love Him - Whitney Houston Hello, Goodbye - Van Hunt Everybody - Raúl Midon Freedom To Love - Incognito Soldier of Love - Sade Tale of Two [Tall Blk Guy rmx] - Eric Roberson Back It On Up (Sho Ya Right) - Chuck Brown & The Soul Searchers No More Tears (Enough Is Enough) - Donna Summer & Barbra Streisand
SO MANY LEGENDS WE'VE LOST IN 2012! WE REMEMBER AND CELEBRATE THEM THROUGH THE AMAZING MUSIC THEY'VE LEFT BEHIND FOR US TO CONTINUE TO ENJOY.

item.title: The Original SSR - wk of May 7
item.description:
THE ORIGINAL SOUL SANCTUARY RADIO - week of May 7 ** Hosted by Your VibeMistress Stephanie Renée **
So What'cha Want - The Beastie Boys Medicine - Stik Figa What's Golden - Jurassic 5 Know That - Mos Def The Truth - India.Arie Earn My Affections - Amel Larrieux Jazz Freestyle [live at the Grammy Pre-Telecast 2011] - Bobby McFerrin & Esperanza Spalding I Can't Help It - Esperanza Spalding Thank Heaven 4 U [Calvin Flowers rmx] - Esthero I Shot The Sheriff - Los Hombres Calientes Sugar Daddy - Honey LaRochelle I'll Be That Bridge - Elliott Yamin Another Star - Stevie Wonder Look Up - Zero 7
SOUL SANCTUARY JOINS THE WORLD IN MOURNING THE LOSS OF ADAM YAUCH, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS MCA OF THE BEASTIE BOYS, AND ALL OF OUR OTHER FRIENDS AND LOVED ONES WHO ARE PASSING FROM THIS PLANE BEFORE THEY REACH OLD AGE.
TAKE GOOD CARE OF YOURSELVES, CONGREGATION, AND REMEMBER TO LIVE AND LOVE IN THE PRESENT TENSE.

So What'cha Want - The Beastie Boys Medicine - Stik Figa What's Golden - Jurassic 5 Know That - Mos Def The Truth - India.Arie Earn My Affections - Amel Larrieux Jazz Freestyle [live at the Grammy Pre-Telecast 2011] - Bobby McFerrin & Esperanza Spalding I Can't Help It - Esperanza Spalding Thank Heaven 4 U [Calvin Flowers rmx] - Esthero I Shot The Sheriff - Los Hombres Calientes Sugar Daddy - Honey LaRochelle I'll Be That Bridge - Elliott Yamin Another Star - Stevie Wonder Look Up - Zero 7
SOUL SANCTUARY JOINS THE WORLD IN MOURNING THE LOSS OF ADAM YAUCH, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS MCA OF THE BEASTIE BOYS, AND ALL OF OUR OTHER FRIENDS AND LOVED ONES WHO ARE PASSING FROM THIS PLANE BEFORE THEY REACH OLD AGE.
TAKE GOOD CARE OF YOURSELVES, CONGREGATION, AND REMEMBER TO LIVE AND LOVE IN THE PRESENT TENSE.

item.title: BHM Special: REBEL MUSIC
item.description:
In lieu of a new Original SSR show this week, we're re-posting this fabulous mix which originally aired on the SS website back in Feb 2005. It's a special blend of sounds showing the outspokenness and beauty of black musical expression through the years.
Original playlist was lost from a damaged hard drive, but the mix features Nina Simone, Ladysmith Black Mambazo, Talib Kweli, Sam Cooke and Common, among others.
Enjoy!

item.title: "Rap" Classics, Vol. 1
item.description: This special Soul Sanctuary Radio mini-mix salutes the art of big pimpin'. Anybody can sing and beg in a song, but how many artists have the cojones to talk smack effectively over an instrumental track? This half-hour compilation honors the art of bragging, boasting and flirting with the spoken word.
